original_text: and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle part of the blood seven times before the Lord in front of the veil of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 그 제사장이 손가락에 그 피를 찍어 여호와 앞 곧 성소의 휘장 앞에 일곱 번 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall dip his finger in the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그 손가락을 피에 담글 것이요

sentences.original_text: and sprinkle part of the blood
in front of the veil of the sanctuary
